text: wmn ayat allah aldalt ealaa 'anah al'ilh alhaqu wahdah la sharik lah waealaa eazim qudratih 'iirsal alriyah 'amam almatar mubashirat b'ithartha llshab, ftstbshr bdhlk alnfws; waliudhiqakum min rahmatih b'inzalh almatar aldhy thya bih albilad walebad, walitajri alsufun fi albahr bi'amr allah wmshyyth, walitabtaghuu min fadlih baltjart wghyrha; faeal allah dhlk min ajl 'an tashkuruu lah nieamah wtebdwh whdh
